firstTimeModal.havePublicProfile:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading indicating successful profile creation
**UI Location**: First Time Profile Modal (main heading)
**When Users See This**: Immediately after a public profile is created for the first time
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "You now have a public profile!"
firstTimeModal.goodJob:
**Functional Purpose**: Encouraging affirmation
**UI Location**: First Time Profile Modal (paragraph start)
**When Users See This**: Immediately after a public profile is created for the first time, as part of the descriptive text
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Good job!"
firstTimeModal.seeSolutions:
**Functional Purpose**: Describes what content is now visible on the public profile
**UI Location**: First Time Profile Modal (paragraph following 'Good job!')
**When Users See This**: Immediately after a public profile is created for the first time
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "You'll now see your published solutions, mentoring testimonials, contributions and badges on your public profile."
firstTimeModal.shareProfile:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the section about sharing the profile link
**UI Location**: First Time Profile Modal (sub-heading in the copy section)
**When Users See This**: Immediately after a public profile is created for the first time
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "You can share your profile with others too!"
reputationInfo.reputationAndTestimonials:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the reputation and testimonials information section.
**UI Location**: Mentor Registration Modal → Commit Step → Reputation Info section (heading).
**When Users See This**: When a user is viewing the 'Commit Step' during mentor registration.
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting.
**Current English**: "Reputation & testimonials"
reputationInfo.gainReputation:
**Functional Purpose**: Explains how a mentor gains reputation and testimonials.
**UI Location**: Mentor Registration Modal → Commit Step → Reputation Info section (paragraph).
**When Users See This**: When a user is viewing the 'Commit Step' during mentor registration.
**Technical Context**: Mentions '6 reputation' and explains the process of students leaving testimonials. The number '6' must remain unchanged.
**Current English**: "You'll gain **6 reputation** for each successful mentoring session. At the end of every discussion, students are invited to leave you a testimonial."
